text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section:
"Affected property" means:
a residential rental property constructed before 1950 that contains not more than one rental dwelling unit; or
a residential rental property that contains not more than one rental dwelling unit for which the owner makes an election under § 6-803(a)(2) of the Environment Article; or
an individual rental dwelling unit within:
a residential rental property constructed before 1950 that contains more than one rental dwelling unit; or
a residential rental property that contains more than one rental dwelling unit for which the owner makes an election under § 6-803(a)(2) of the Environment Article.
"Affected property" does not include property exempted under § 6-803(b) of the Environment Article.

text.section: "Owner" has the meaning stated in § 6-801(o) of the Environment Article.
"Rental dwelling unit" has the meaning stated in § 6-801(t) of the Environment Article.
